cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature card is put into exile from graveyards and/or the battlefield, choose one —
 • Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
 • Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
 • Destroy target creature you control and return it to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.

This creature can't block.
This creature has haste as long as an opponent has 10 or less life.
[i]Landfall[/i] — Whenever a land you control enters, you may return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Flying
Whenever a creature card is put into exile from graveyards and/or the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Belltoll Beast.
As long as Belltoll Beast has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, whenever it attacks, defending player must exile two permanents they control.

Flying
When this creature enters, exile another target creature you own. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step. Then if that creature was a Spirit or Shade, you gain 2 life.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, add {W} or {B}.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The energy of the departed fuels her power, a grim harvest from the fields of death.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Double strike
When this creature enters, exile target creature an opponent controls until this creature leaves the battlefield.
Creatures your opponents control that share a type with the exiled creature enter tapped.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Some fates are sealed at birth. Theirs was to seal the fates of others.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i]Witness Fate — [/i]Whenever another creature dies, you may exile it. Do this only once each turn.
{3}{W}, {T}: Put a creature card exiled with Ophelia onto the battlefield under your control. Exile it at the beginning of your next turn's end step.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“They fall, they rise, they fall again. Such is the rhythm of each cycle. We will document it.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature you control is put into exile, you gain 2 life.
Spirits you control gain +1/+1 and have lifelink.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Not all guardians shout. Some merely wait.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Menace, lifelink
Whenever Faye's Condemned deals combat damage to a player, you may exile target creature that player controls.
At the beginning of your upkeep, return up to one creature card exiled with Faye's Condemned to the battlefield under your control.

Menace
Whenever Quinn enters and/or an opponent loses life, exile up to one target creature you control or target creature card from a graveyard.
Quinn gets +1/+1 for each creature in exile.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“A little death never hurt anyone. A lot, however—that's where I come in.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Duskwood Familiar dies, you may exile it. If you do, return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor_text: [i]They follow their masters between worlds, bearing memories like lanterns.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When this creature is put into exile, draw a card.
When this creature dies, you may pay {W}. If you do, exile it instead.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Death is not an end, but a transition to a watchful vigil.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:

Whenever a creature card is exiled from a graveyard, you gain 1 life.

Flying

At the beginning of your end step, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)[/i]

Afterlife X. X is equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on this creature. [i](Whenever this creature dies, create X 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)[/i]
Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may exile it. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

Lifelink
When Hexbinder Witchling enters, return up to one target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. When Hexbinder Witchling dies, exile that creature.

Menace
Whenever a creature an opponent controls is put into exile, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]It visits in dreams and feeds on memory, until only guilt remains.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature card is exiled from a graveyard, you may choose one —
• Forgotten Choir gains lifelink until end of turn.
• Forgotten Choir gains indestructible until end of turn.
• Tap target creature.
{W}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: scry 1 and create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I take only what the threads of fate have already frayed.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When this creature enters, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. It becomes a Spirit in addition to its other types.
When this creature dies, you may exile it. If you do, you gain life equal to the number of Spirits in exile and each opponent loses life equal to the number of Spirits on the battlefield.

Flying
Whenever a creature is put into exile from the battlefield, each opponent loses life equal to its power.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Its hunger isn't for flesh, but for the choices that led you here.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
When Last Rite Pariah enters, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life for each creature card in exile.
When Last Rite Pariah is exiled from the battlefield, draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]She leads the dead into light and drags any who stray from their fate down with them.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
When Sanctum Ghast enters, exile up to two target nonland permanents on the battlefield.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more creatures than you, return a card exiled with Sanctum Ghast to its owner's hand.

Vigilance
Whenever a creature you control is put into exile, creatures opponents control can't attack this turn unless that player pays {2} for each attacking creature.

When Fateworn Caretaker enters, exile up to one other target creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
Whenever a permanent returns to the battlefield from exile, draw a card.

Whenever a creature is exiled from your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Fate-Spun Acolyte.
{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Fate-Spun Acolyte: Exile target creature an opponent controls. Activate only if Fate-Spun Acolyte has three or more +1/+1 counters on it.
When Felidar Guardian enters the battlefield, you may exile another target permanent you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The loyalty of a felidar is hard won but worth the effort.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever a creature card is exiled from a graveyard, create a tapped Treasure token.

Mercybone Pilgrim can't block.
